text: as you know our officers confronted the
suspects and brought this terrible
incident to a conclusion within eight
minutes it is now being confirmed sadly
that seven members of the public have
died in addition as you know we believe
three suspects are dead
my current information is that 48 people
have been injured and 48 people were
indeed taken to hospital for treatment
just to remind you we were called at
10:08 p.m. last night initially to
reports that a vehicle had struck
pedestrians on London Bridge that
vehicle continued to drive from London
Bridge to Borough Market the suspects
then left the vehicle and a number of
people were stabbed the suspects were
shot dead by armed officers we believe
that this incident is under control
however a large cordon remains in the
area around London Bridge and Borough
Market and there are many officers on
scene as we need still to carry out a
thorough search of the area to ensure
that everyone has been accounted for and
to make the whole area safe
